title: Postscript printer for proofing
content:
Greetings.

A question I’m sure somebody will be able to help me with: I’m looking to purchase a A4 Postscript printer (not an emulator) to proof my type with. I have a smallish budget and am unsure what to go for. I would normally post the quesion at said electronics store, but I need feedback from type designers as opposed to sales people. I look forward to the feedback …
author: alphapeta
